Text.Page:
In the middle of {@Rgn:49001}, you can see an enormous tower called the {@Rgn:49003}. Intelligence believes the argons use its energy to fuel their troops. That makes for one tasty target.

There's a contingent of arzakaar thassalirs inside.

Get rid of them. They're probably the most potent defenders at the site.

Interesting. It's almost as if the arzakaars weren't guarding the facility, but were stationed there for another purpose.

Well, it matters little now. They're dead and we've a war to win.
